text: Destroy All Humans! 2 is a action-adventure video game released in 2006. It is a sequel to Destroy All Humans! developed by Pandemic Studios, and is the second and last game developed by the original studio before EA acquired them. A third game in the series, Destroy All Humans! Big Willy Unleashed, was released in 2008. Category:2006 video games Category:Destroy All Humans! title: Destroy All Humans! 2
